question: 7) Math – Multiple Choice Which of the following statements is logically equivalent to "If T is a leopard, then T has spots"? W) If T has spots, then T is a leopard. answer: Y) IF T DOES NOT HAVE SPOTS, THEN T IS NOT A LEOPARD.
